ideas.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
ideas.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.
hooks: Design Guardrails That Don't Kill Creativity
Unlock Scalable Templates Without Brand Police
Build Flexible Templates Marketers Will Love

tips: Pre-promote Live Stream in Figma community groups
Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction

visualDirection.description: High-energy, dynamic split-screen layout with live presenter on right, Figma interface/template examples on left. Bold geometric typography with electric blue/deep purple accent colors. Animated transition elements highlighting template flexibility. Motion graphics demonstrating template constraints/freedoms.

exampleOutline: Live Stream Intro: Personal Template Challenge Story
Why Templates Break (Real Marketing Scenarios)
8 Strategic Template Design Principles
Live Demonstration & Community Q&A
Closing: Invitation to Experiment & Share Templates

ideas.title: The AI healthcare gold rush is here
ideas.description: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about hallucination risks, inaccurate medical information, and […]
hooks: AI is transforming healthcare faster than you think
Billion-dollar battle: Tech giants racing into medicine
Healthcare's AI revolution: Who will win?

tips: Use archival medical/tech footage as B-roll
Include expert talking head interviews with healthcare/AI professionals
Create dynamic motion graphics showing AI healthcare workflow transitions

visualDirection.description: High-contrast medical/tech color palette (deep blues, clinical whites, electric accents). Futuristic data visualization overlays. Clean, geometric typography with technical precision. Kinetic transitions suggesting rapid technological evolution. Blend clinical documentary aesthetics with modern tech design sensibility.

exampleOutline: Cold open: Dramatic AI healthcare intervention scene
Historical context of medical technology limitations
Current AI healthcare investment landscape
Breakthrough technologies and potential impacts
Ethical considerations and future predictions

ideas.title: OpenAI and Anthropic are making their play for healthcare, and we’re not surprised
ideas.description: AI companies are clustering around healthcare, and fast.  In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for Health, and Sam Altman-backed Merge Labs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation. The money and products are pouring into health and voice AI, but so are concerns about […]
hooks: AI is hijacking healthcare - and nobody's talking about it
The $850M healthcare AI takeover nobody expected
Big Tech's secret healthcare revolution starts now

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of health AI interfaces
Create chapter markers for complex topics
Use medical/tech graphics to illustrate AI integration points

visualDirection.description: High-contrast medical tech palette (deep blues, electric greens), futuristic motion graphics overlaying medical imagery, sleek sans-serif typography with technical data visualizations, subtle holographic UI elements suggesting AI transformation

exampleOutline: Opening: Provocative AI healthcare transformation headline
Context: Current healthcare technology landscape
Key Players: OpenAI, Anthropic's strategic moves
Technical Deep Dive: How AI is restructuring healthcare
Future Implications & Call to Action

ideas.title: Introducing three new tools for precise image editing in Figma
ideas.description: Today we’re introducing three new AI image editing tools that make precision editing faster, cleaner, and more intuitive—powering a more complete creative workflow in Figma.
hooks: AI Image Magic: 3 Figma Tools That Will Blow Your Mind
Editing Just Got Smarter: Figma's New AI Arsenal
Precision Editing Revolution: What Figma Just Unleashed

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Use YouTube Premieres to build anticipation before live stream
Prepare pre-submitted Q&A questions to maintain momentum

visualDirection.description: High-energy, dynamic visual design with electric blue and deep purple color palette. Floating, translucent UI elements showcasing AI image editing. Sleek, modern typography with animated transition effects. Minimalist screen recordings with dynamic picture-in-picture demonstrations. Futuristic motion graphics highlighting tool capabilities.

exampleOutline: Section 1: High-Energy Live Stream Introduction
Section 2: Current Image Editing Pain Points
Section 3: Deep Dive into 3 New AI Tools
Section 4: Live Demonstration & Workflow Integration

ideas.title: Three new features to help build brand momentum with Figma Buzz
ideas.description: With marketing templates that are now connected to your design system, plugins that pull in your favorite apps, and video trimming in Figma Buzz, we’re giving designers and marketers new tools to create branded assets that speak volumes.
hooks: Supercharge Your Figma Workflow in 3 Epic Steps
Design Faster: Figma Buzz's Hidden Productivity Hacks
Transform Your Marketing Assets with Figma's New Features

tips: Use clear chapter markers for each step
Include picture-in-picture screen recordings of Figma interface
Create visual progress indicators between tutorial sections

visualDirection.description: Bold, dynamic visual style with high-contrast design system colors. Use clean, modern typography with motion-guided transitions between steps. Incorporate Figma's brand blue and white palette with energetic accent colors. Utilize dynamic screen capture animations with smooth zoom and highlight effects. Aesthetic reference: Apple product tutorial videos mixed with design-forward motion graphics.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Energetic Hook - Why These Figma Features Matter
Section 2: Current Design Workflow Challenges
Section 3: Step-by-Step Feature Walkthrough (Marketing Templates, Plugins, Video Trimming)
Section 4: Pro Tips and Workflow Integration Insights
Section 5: Call-to-Action and Future Design Possibilities
